description_txt: stated on July 6, 2018 in a TV interview:

description_txt: stated on August 22, 2018 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: "While Richard Cordray was Attorney General, 12,000 rape kits like Allyssa's were left untested. Cordray's failure left serial rapists free to strike again. Then Mike DeWine became Attorney General. He tested all 12,000 rape kits. Now hundreds of rapists are behind bars."
